alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:45PM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills ongoing. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Fort Collins, and Briggsdale. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Storm Warning, until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
